name: Alone Music Bot
description: Powerful telegram's group voice chat music player. Run on python3 !!

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string from account

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

ASSID.description: Fill with your music assistant's ID

BG_IMG.description: Fill with Telegraph image Link for Thumbnail !!

ASSNAME.description: Fill with your music Assistant's Name

ASSUSERNAME.description: Fill with your Music Assistant's Username without @

BOT_ID.description: fill with telegram id of bot

BOT_USERNAME.description: fill with telegram username of bot without @

SUPPORT.description: Fill with your support group username without @

UPDATE.description: Fill with your Update Channel username without @

OWNER_USERNAME.description: Fill with the Bot Owner Username without @

BOT_NAME.description: fill with telegram name of bot

START_PIC.description: Enter the telegraph link of an image or contact @DuskyBotZSupport

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

MONGO_DB_URI.description: fill with the mongodb url get from mongodb.cloud.com (don't use mine below !!)
